title:
Fisher information and continuity estimates for nonlinear but
  1-homogeneous diffusive PDEs (via the JKO scheme)
abstract:
In this short paper we prove, using the JKO scheme, that quantities such as
the Fisher information stay bounded or decrease across time for a family of
1-homogeneous diffusive PDEs. As a corollary, we prove that moduli of
continuity are conserved across time for the solutions of those PDEs.
